text: René Marigil (24 October 1928 - 25 October 2009) was a Spanish professional racing cyclist. He rode in four editions of the Tour de France. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1928 births Category:2009 deaths Category:Spanish male cyclists Category:People from Tarn (department) Category:Tour de France cyclists Category:Vuelta a España cyclists
title: René Marigil
